column1: Smoque BBQ////Al recommended the half-and-half sandwich which is half pulled pork and half brisket.... that way you get to try both!  It was TOTALLY awesome
column2: but I think I liked the brisket best.  Get both the BBQ sauces so you can see if you like North Carolina style (vinegar) or Memphis (tangy) better.  The fries
column3: cornbread and slaw were perfect accompaniments.  I tried my dates mac 'n cheese and thought it was only so-so but I'm not a huge mac 'n cheese fan anyway.
